body:
If anyone watches "Anime". I suggest using Anime List.

http://myanimelist.net/panel.php

It's really nice to have a list to show what you've watched or haven't easy way to exchange Anime's you've sen of haven't :)

title: Anime List

replies.body: I'll try it out, does it give you recommendations based on the anime you watched previously.
replies.body_tagged: I'll try it out, does it give you recommendations based on the anime you watched previously.

replies.body: Yeah It does give recommended. Try and search an Anime and at the top it will say "Recommendations" :)
